channel.title: Predictions on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Predictions on Stats On the T

item.title: Predictions for the 2018 Australian Open Men's Draw
item.description: Ahead of the first round of the Australian Open, I take a look at some of the likely winners on the men’s side. The forecast bodes well for the Big 3, with Novak Djokovic leading the race toward the first slam title of the 2019 season.

item.title: Forecasts for the 2018 Miami Masters Title
item.description: After a near perfect first quarter of the season, Roger Federer enters the Miami Masters with a 50-50 chance of winning the title, thanks in part to the luck of the draw. Who are the other biggest male and female contenders for the Key Biscayne title?
